column4: When I watch movies in fullscreen the computer logs me out, how do i prevent that from happening when the video is in fullscreen?
it isn't crashing, the computer doesn't see any keystrokes and logs me out
logs me out is not normal, something must be crashing.
by logging me out, I don't mean it closes my programs down, only locks the screen... i don't know if that was clear
logging me out was misleading if you meant locks screen.
you're watching things in flash? flash is buggy to say the least.
is there anything i can do?
ChessTeach i do not know how to improve performance.
i guess then i just need to disable auto screen lock?
that doesn't mean its not possible. give good details of the issue to the channel, someone might know. details mean what applications you're using and exact details to what it breaks/does.
